Typedef Documentation

typedef CGPoint ARAnchor

An anchor of an object is given by a point in unit coordinate space.

CGFloat  y 
) [inline, static]

Creates an anchor with the given values.

Parameters:

y Value in the range [-1,1].

An anchor.
ARAnchor ARAnchorMakeWithXMLString ( NSString *  string,
BOOL *  valid 
)

Creates the anchor represented by the given Gamaray XML string, which is one of TL, TC, TR, CL, CC, CR, BL, BC and BR.

Parameters:
string The string to parse. May be nil.
valid Upon return of this method, the referenced variable will indicate whether the given string was valid. May be NULL if this value is not needed.
Returns:
The anchor, or (0.5, 0.5) if the given string was not valid.
